_header: This wide world is so large of space
Note: For a variant text see 81 by Lydgate.
_description: They That No While Endure — seven eight-line stanzas (ababbcbc) each ending with this phrase

BLHar2255.First Lines:
This wyde woourld is so large of spaceNo man hath poweer it holly
                    to restreyne…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…by devoute prayeer to helpe in suych a nedethorugh mercy and
                    grace and so longe endure Explicit
BLHar2255.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. II: Secular Poems.
